thag4.11:6.1: When the crane, so pure and white,
thag4.11:6.2: startled by fear of the dark thundercloud,
thag4.11:6.3: seeks a cave to shelter in, but can’t see one—
thag4.11:6.4: then the River Ajakaraṇī delights me.

thag4.11:8.1: Rid of snakes, that death-mad swarm,
